content: be kind by melissa simpson supplies gauge 5 spi 2-4 oz of worsted weight yarn fit 1 inch negative ease tight fitting beanie darning needle sizing 14 16 18 20 22 24 inches nb through adult us 6 16 inch needles us 8 16 inch needles us 8 dpn s optional 1 stitch marker pattern cast on using smaller needles 70 80 90 100 110 120 stitches place marker and join in the round and knit in k3xp2 ribbing for 2 2 2 2 2 2 inches switch to larger needles and knit for 5 5 6 6 5 7 7 5 8 in k3xp2 ribbing from cast on edge begin crown shaping row 1 *k1 k2tog p2* repeat till end of the round row 2-3 *k2 p2*repeat till end of the round row 4 *k2 p2tog* repeat till end of the round row 5-6 *k2 p1* repeat till end of the round row 7 *k2tog p1* repeat till end of the round row 8-9 k1 p1* repeat till end of the round row 10 *k2tog* repeat till end of the round row 11 *k2tog* repeat till end of the round repeat until there is less than 6 stitches left cut yarn leaving a 8 inch tail and weave it through the remaining stitches on the needle and pull tight weave in ends hat can be worn with the ribbing folded up or down to cover the ears
